name: Bald Light
description:
/!\ Don't take this too seriously  /!\

This is mainly a joke...

... and secondly a way of filling our CV

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Survive and discover your true self in a hostile dilapidated labo with your head's unique skill of light reflection.

                  Controls : 
  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to aim
                   Credits :
  • Mathis Bressaud
  • Alex Kadri
  • Benoit Deneaux
  • Paul Lyaudet

Made in 48h
